response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value for you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to purchase this product for $15,000. This special price reflects my confidence in its value and my desire to see it go to someone who appreciates it as much as we do. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 15000}
